name: Jay Leno
monologue: Vice President Joe Biden has a new Twitter account. He said he will not rest until he can embarrass the president on every media platform ever invented.

name: Jay Leno
monologue: A woman in Mexico was arrested after she tried sneak her husband out of prison inside her suitcase after a conjugal visit. Or as southwest calls it: the next big thing in air travel.

name: Jay Leno
monologue: At Coney Island, they had the annual hot dog eating contest and in keeping with tradition, the winner was a loser.

name: Jay Leno
monologue: Joey Chestnut won the hot dog eating contest on July 4th. He ate 62 hot dogs in 10 minutes. They gave him a championship belt. A belt? Is that what you give a guy who ate 62 hot dogs in 10 minutes? How about a new pair of pants?
